body.name: Gawfolk 25 Inch Gaming Monitor, 144hz/180hz Computer Monitor FHD 1080P PC Monitors,Frameless Curved Monitors VA,sRGB 100%, DisplayPort, HDMI,Eye Care, Wall Mount Compatible (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 4 hrs 10 mins
features: 【180hz PC Monitor】Gawfolk 25-inch gaming monitor combines high resolution with an impressive 144Hz/180Hz refresh rate. Enhanced by freesync technology, it effectively eliminates tearing and freezing, ensuring crystal-clear video playback for an exceptional gaming experience.

【Exceptional Gaming Experience】Gawfalk PC monitors utilize Adaptive-Sync technology for smooth, tear-free gaming experiences, eliminating lag and input delays. Enjoy immersive gameplay with added eye protection through flicker-free and low blue light features during extended gaming sessions.

【Vivid Color】the curved gaming monitor offers a vibrant visual experience with 8-bit color depth, an extensive 16.7 million color gamut, a dynamic 3000:1 contrast ratio, and full coverage of the sRGB spectrum. Immerse yourself in rich, detailed colors that bring your gaming and visuals to life

【Flexible Connectivity】Gawfolk gaming monitor provides HDMI(2.0)*1 and DisplayPort(1.2)*1 interfaces, offering connections to Xbox, PC, laptops, and more. Experience high-quality image transmission, allowing you to seamlessly transition between work and entertainment.Support HDMI (up to 144Hz), DP (up to 180Hz), USB, Audio out, and wall mounting 75mm75mm compatible

【Gawfolk Services】Gawfolk provide high-quality computer monitor and premium services, included worry-free 18-month warranty. If you find any damage, malfunction or missing accessories, please feel free to contact us.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: A 180Hz gaming monitor 180hz combined with FreeSync technology, ensures seamless, tear-free frame rendering and delivers stunning graphics. Low blue light Protect your eyes ,reducing eye discomfort and help maintain healthy eyes.Reducing blue light exposure can reduce eye strain and distractions, leading to increased productivity in work and studies. FreeSync Technology Galfolk monitors leverage FreeSync technology to ensure high FPS rates, eliminating screen tearing, lag, and input delay for a fully immersive gaming experience

24.5 inch pc monitor HDMI 2.0 supports a 144HZ refresh rate, and DP 1.2 supports a 180HZ refresh rate. improving image clarity for all action-packed game sequences and graphic design projects. Comes with an audio output interface, supports external headphones and external speaker audio output.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good monitor
reviews.reviewText: It is a nice monitor for the price. In comparison with my basic Samsung monitor the image quality is comparable but the refresh rate is really good in this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations
reviews.reviewText: For the low price, I wasn't sure what I was going to get, but this monitor exceeded my expectations. Easy to assemble, GREAT picture quality. I use it more for video editing than gaming and it works splendidly! Nice colors, no flicker. This is a VERY good product at a very good price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality items

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the money, it's a great monitor!
reviews.reviewText: I needed an inexpensive monitor for my desk setup to study from. Compared to my 13 inch macbook, this monitor has way more screen space to have multiple windows open at once which is exactly what I was looking for. My only con is it isnt as curved as I thought it would be but over all I am very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No speakers Great Resolution
reviews.reviewText: Most cost effective for a curved small monitor. At what cost though? There are 2 ways to connect; VGA display cord and HDMI. This doesn't mean you can hook your pc through VGA and use the HDMI port for say a firestick. Hdmi port will take priority and need to unplug to have the VGA pc. Display playing. There's also no speakers so if you don't have the pc set in place on your desk already you'll need a pair with this TV if you plan to hear any sounds. The display itself is very clear crisp with no glare issues. Pivoting up & down to find the best view is easy just be sure to hold your base and push center of the top frame or bottom depending on direction of travel. Sturdy feeling base and weight of screen seems to be quality manufactured.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great monitor for the price
reviews.reviewText: This 27" monitor has everything I need for a daily use and all for the right price. The picture quality is good for 1080P and what really helps is the 165 Hz refresh rate. It has to be adjusted in the monitor settings in the computer though, not on the monitor's OSD. Colors are great and response time is good - no blurriness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The monitor arrived quickly and was very easy to set up. Good picture quality. Not much of a curve to the monitor but still good for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Colors are great
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is amazing I love it and for the price the quality is great and easy to put together
